CustomField.description: If the SObject that should be queried contains a relevant date field, put the SObject field name here (e.g., Date, ActivityDate, CustomDate__c)
CustomField.inlineHelpText: If the SObject that should be queried contains a relevant date field, put the SObject field name here (e.g., Date, ActivityDate, CustomDate__c)
CustomField.label: Date Field API Name
